programme.sub-title: The Allies succeed in crossing the Rhine and fight their way through Germany as the Red Army finally forces Axis troops from Soviet territory and closes on the capital, Berlin.
programme.desc: The story of how a world that was centuries in the making was completely remade in years of war. Traditional powers fell from greatness as new forces rose to make the modern world.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Science
programme.sub-title: What secrets did the Nazis hope to find inside the cells and DNA of the human body? Some of the most nauseating Nazi experiments were performed in the name of creating a pure Aryan race.
programme.desc: When the Nazi empire collapsed at the end of WWII, the darkest secrets of the Third Reich came to light; this series exposes everything from biological experiments to supersize feats of engineering.

programme.title: Women Under Hitlers Flag
programme.sub-title: This first episode, which begins with Hitlers arrival in power in 1933, goes back to the roots of the indoctrination of young German girls within the female branch of the Hitler Youth (BDM).
programme.desc: Many German women were active participants in the Nazi regime, some proving to be as ruthless as their better-known male counterparts; why did post-war justice turn a blind eye to their crimes?

programme.title: Women Under Hitlers Flag
programme.sub-title: Women were far from mere witnesses or accomplices by 1942 - and played a role as important as it was deadly. After the war, the women of the Reich simply slipped through the judicial net.
programme.desc: Many German women were active participants in the Nazi regime, some proving to be as ruthless as their better-known male counterparts; why did post-war justice turn a blind eye to their crimes?

programme.title: The Rise of the Dictators
programme.sub-title: Dictators often want to extend their power beyond their countrys borders; this generally means military aggression and the deaths of vast numbers of soldiers and civilians.
programme.desc: Told through six themed episodes, this series explores how dictators rise to power in a compelling insight into the fragility of democracy and the frightening resilience of authoritarianism.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: As the Red Army approached a forest in Poland toward the end of the war, they stumbled upon a complex containing more than 1,000 structures across 25 square kilometres.
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.title: D-Day: The 80th Anniversary
programme.desc: This documentary shows a different side of D-Day: not just the famous shots of the beaches at Normandy, but the troops, sailors and civilians on the South Coast of England preparing for battle too.

programme.title: Eiffel: Towers War
programme.desc: The Eiffel Tower might never have seen the light of day; it owes its existence to the tenacity of visionary engineer Gustave Eiffel prevailing over his main rival architect Jules Bourdais.

programme.title: Ancient Superstructures
programme.sub-title: The Church of the Holy Sepulchre is the most sacred Christian site in the world; defied by time, wars and earthquakes, it was rebuilt many times and now excavations reveal its secrets as never before.
programme.desc: We delve into the engineering mysteries behind the worlds most famous ancient structures by observing them from perspectives ranging from satellite imagery right down to macro and microscopic levels.

programme.title: Cursed Treasures
programme.sub-title: The removal of some priceless artefacts at the Parthenon in Athens brought only trouble, and one of the worlds most famous artists ended his life in France soon after finishing a doomed painting.
programme.desc: Leading experts in their field try to unravel the mystery behind fascinating and doomed objects including Tutankhamuns tomb, the Terracotta Army, the Hope Diamond and the Amber Room.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.sub-title: What is the purpose of a 3,500-year-old ornamented box, can a gun powered by steam revolutionise warfare, and is a carved stone monument really the throne of the most famous Aztec ruler of all?
programme.desc: Hidden away in museums, laboratories, and storage rooms around the world are the most remarkable objects on Earth; using new research and technology, we get under their skin like never before.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: The Devils Bible has long intrigued experts; who wrote it? In search of the truth, we visit a castle said to house a gate to Hell, huge rock-carved demons, and the palaces of heretical monarchs.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Forbidden History
programme.sub-title: We discover an intriguing new theory about Gobekli Tepe in southern Turkey; one of the worlds oldest mysteries dating back over 12,000 years, we still dont understand who built it or why.
programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Churchills Forgotten War
programme.desc: In the summer of 1940, Churchill had taken power and the decision to arrest UK citizens originating from Germany, Austria and Italy; many were perfectly innocent men and some were Jewish refugees.

programme.title: The Frontier
programme.sub-title: The territory of California proves invaluable as the discovery of gold unleashes the largest migration in US history and ignites a debate on slavery that culminates in the American Civil War.
programme.desc: This series explores the legends, events and folklore of the American frontier, a place that has become part of one of the defining periods of American national identity.

programme.title: The Frontier
programme.sub-title: A race of the railroads to join the East and West Coasts begins a new chapter in US dominance and leads to the rise of an American icon: the cowboy.
programme.desc: This series explores the legends, events and folklore of the American frontier, a place that has become part of one of the defining periods of American national identity.

programme.title: The Frontier
programme.sub-title: As the century draws to a close, the scars of systematic ethnic cleansing of native peoples - along with US claims on land - seemingly ends the frontier chapter in American history.
programme.desc: This series explores the legends, events and folklore of the American frontier, a place that has become part of one of the defining periods of American national identity.

programme.title: D-Day: The 80th Anniversary

programme.sub-title: Berlin falls and the war in Europe ends. Okinawa falls with terrible losses on both sides as each prepares for the invasion of the first of the major home islands - but a new weapon is unleashed.
programme.desc: The story of how a world that was centuries in the making was completely remade in years of war. Traditional powers fell from greatness as new forces rose to make the modern world.

programme.title: WWII: Frontlines
programme.sub-title: June 1942: the most decisive naval-air battle in the Pacific started as a Japanese trap and ended as an American ambush, a totally unpredictable conflict made up of luck, code-breaking, and gambles.
programme.desc: From North Africa to Northern Europe and the Mediterranean to the Pacific, we reflect on the enormous diversity of conditions which frontline soldiers had to come to grips with during WWII.

programme.title: World War II: The Price of Empire
programme.sub-title: Berlin falls and the war in Europe ends. Okinawa falls with terrible losses on both sides as each prepares for the invasion of the first of the major home islands - but a new weapon is unleashed.
programme.desc: The story of how a world that was centuries in the making was completely remade in years of war. Traditional powers fell from greatness as new forces rose to make the modern world.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Science
programme.sub-title: WWII was a war in the skies; though the Treaty of Versailles had prevented the Germans from developing new weapons, they sponsored air clubs and pushed for supremacy in the air.
programme.desc: When the Nazi empire collapsed at the end of WWII, the darkest secrets of the Third Reich came to light; this series exposes everything from biological experiments to supersize feats of engineering.

programme.title: Ancient Superstructures
programme.sub-title: The Church of the Holy Sepulchre is the most sacred Christian site in the world; defied by time, wars and earthquakes, it was rebuilt many times and now excavations reveal its secrets as never before.
programme.desc: We delve into the engineering mysteries behind the worlds most famous ancient structures by observing them from perspectives ranging from satellite imagery right down to macro and microscopic levels.

programme.title: Eiffel: Towers War
programme.desc: The Eiffel Tower might never have seen the light of day; it owes its existence to the tenacity of visionary engineer Gustave Eiffel prevailing over his main rival architect Jules Bourdais.

programme.title: The Rise of the Dictators
programme.sub-title: Dictatorships are almost universally unsustainable; a dictators thirst for power invariably leads to greater and greater oppression, leaving a nation broken and so all dictatorships eventually fall.
programme.desc: Told through six themed episodes, this series explores how dictators rise to power in a compelling insight into the fragility of democracy and the frightening resilience of authoritarianism.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.sub-title: A secret weapons programme in the heart of Austria could have ended badly for the Allies and may have indicated nuclear plans being concocted by Hitler.
programme.desc: The collapse of the Third Reich left as many secrets as it did relics; remnants of the Nazis schemes still lie concealed in structures scattered across the globe today.

programme.title: The Underground Army
programme.sub-title: Explore the invasion of Poland at the start of World War II and the creation of the Underground Army, a resistance movement that became the most powerful of its kind in Europe.
programme.desc: This is the story of the Polish Underground State, the largest group of anti-Hitler guerrillas in occupied Europe; we learn how they showed incredible resilience and changed the course of WWII.

programme.title: D-Day: The Soldiers Story
programme.sub-title: Giles Milton visits key D-Day sites along the Normandy coastline - including Omaha Beach and Pegasus Bridge - and we hear the stories of the men and women on both the attacking and defensive lines.
programme.desc: A two-part documentary that tells the story of D-Day - June the 6th, 1944 like its never been told before as presenter Giles Milton reveals an astonishing tale of fear, courage and heroism.

programme.title: D-Day: The Soldiers Story
programme.sub-title: Giles Milton guides us round Normandy - the place where the D-Day invasion proved successful - from the gliders who went behind enemy lines to paratroopers who ambushed vital German generals.
programme.desc: A two-part documentary that tells the story of D-Day - June the 6th, 1944 like its never been told before as presenter Giles Milton reveals an astonishing tale of fear, courage and heroism.

programme.title: Cursed Treasures
programme.sub-title: The historical kingdom of Benin in Africa was destroyed in 1897; with its city burned to the ground and precious artefacts looted, did this bloody and violent end lead to a curse?
programme.desc: Leading experts in their field try to unravel the mystery behind fascinating and doomed objects including Tutankhamuns tomb, the Terracotta Army, the Hope Diamond and the Amber Room.

programme.title: Tasuja Londonist (1999)
programme.desc: Äarmiselt kergesti arrituv ja ohtlik inglane laheb Los Angelesse, et leida mees, keda ta peab oma tutre surma eest vastutavaks.

programme.title: Hullud (2010)
programme.desc: Kui ebatavaline murgine viirus satub veidrasse põllumeeste linna parast kummalist ja arusaamatut lennuõnnetust, pannakse noorpaar karantiini ja nad peavad võitlema ellujaamise eest vaid paari liitlase abiga.

programme.title: Kõuekargatus
programme.desc: 2055. aastal on ajas randamine tõeks saanud. Igauks saab nuud dinosaurustele kulla minna, kuid uks ettevaatamatu samm minevikus muudab taielikult tulevikku...

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Palgamõrvarite bande Arktika Hundid roovib hiina arimehe koos tutrega. Politsei kaed on seotud ja appi tuleb salateenistuse professionaalne uksus Vanguard eesotsas Jackie Chani tegelaskujuga.

programme.title: Cryo
programme.desc: Viis teadlast arkavad maa-aluses laboris kruoonilisest unest ega maleta, kes nad on või kuidas uinusid. Peagi selgub šokeeriv tõde, et neid jahib palgamõrvar.

programme.desc: Magironimismatkal juhtub õnnetus ning parimad sõbrannad Becky ja Hunter jaavad lõksu 600 meetri kõrguse teletorni tippu.

programme.title: Terminal
programme.desc: Saatuslik naine Annie tabab inglise kriminaali otse sudamesse. Naine assitab kurjategijaid uksteise vastu ules, esinedes igauhe ees erinevas rollis.

programme.title: Patu linn 2
programme.desc: Patu linna hamaratel põiktanavatel plaanib Dwight maksta katte julmale naisele Ava Lordile, kes teda reetis. Nancy puuab samal ajal leppida detektiiv Hartigani surmaga. 2014

programme.title: Halastamatu
programme.desc: Uuritakse USA valitsuse kõrge ametniku tutre roovi.

programme.title: Noored assad (1988)
programme.desc: Grupp noori pussimehi Billy the Kidi juhtimisel saavad šerifiabideks, et maksta katte nende heategijaks saanud rantšopidaja mõrva eest.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Kaks noort ameeriklannat, Vicky ja Cristina, veedavad suve Barcelonas. Vicky on vanamoeline ja valmis tõsiseks suhteks. Cristina on seksuaalselt vabameelne ja veetlevalt massajalik. Antonio ei oska kahe neiu vahel valida. Armukolmnurk muutub aina keerulisemaks.

programme.title: Juhusuhe
programme.desc: Kahe nutika lapse lahutatud ema palkab lapsehoidjaks noormehe, kel tekivad tema suhtes peagi sugavamad tunded. Kas see võib olla see, mida nad mõlemad on otsinud? 2009

programme.title: Linnapreili provintsis
programme.desc: Floridast, Miami osariigis parit arinaine puuab kohaneda eluga Minnesota vaikelinnas.

programme.title: Takso 4
programme.desc: Marseille politseiosakonda tuuakse eriti kohtlik kurjategija, kel seisab ees Aafrikas kohtu ette ilmumine. Kaval kurjategija veenab kogenematut politseinikku, et ta on Belgia saatkonna tootaja. 2007

programme.title: Armujook nr 9
programme.desc: Vallalise biokeemiku ja tema erakliku kolleegi katte satub salaparane ja kahtlane jook. Parast edukaid katseid ahvidel otsustavad nad proovida eliksiiri iseendi peal! 1992

programme.title: Ma ei tea, kuidas ta seda teeb
programme.desc: Kate puuab uhendada karjaari ja pereelu. Kui talle pakutakse tood, mis eeldab sagedast reisimist ja tema mees saab kauaoodatud arhitektuuriprojekti, hakkab olukord kontrolli alt libisema. 2011

programme.title: Koerte hotell
programme.desc: Mahajaetud hotell, kuhu on kolinud hulkuvad koerad, jaab silma kahele lapsele. Neil ei lubata koeri koju tuua ja nad otsustavad teha koerale oma kodu, kus saaksid elada kõik kodutud koerad.

programme.title: Charlotte koob võrku
programme.desc: Siga Wilbur kardab hooaja lõppu, sest teab, et ta lõpetab lõunalaual. Koos amblik Charlottega sepitseb ta salaplaani selle musta stsenaariumi arahoidmiseks.

programme.title: Saage tuttavaks - Dave
programme.desc: Maale maabub kaabuskasvu tulnukatega õhulaev, mis naeb valja nagu taiesti tavaline inimene. Tulnukate missioon on paasta oma planeet Maa arvelt, kuid New Yorkis ringi vaadates nende plaanid muutuvad.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Korraga ei ole briti luureteenistusel enam uhtegi agenti. Juhtkonnal ei jaa muud ule kui usaldada kroonijuveelide valvamine MI5 kõige kapardlikuma kaastootaja Johnny Englishi hoolde.

programme.title: Johnny English: taassund
programme.desc: Parast uue missiooni labikukkumist varjub agent Johnny English Tiibetis. Ta ei oota et briti salateenistus temaga uuesti uhendust võtab. Ta saab ulesande hoida ara atentaat Hiina peaministrile.

programme.title: Ülihull
programme.desc: Neljakumnele lahenev naine mõistab, et on terve elu elanud teiste jaoks. Ta teeb labi iidse rituaali ja muutub ulbeks bitchiks, kes ei oska suud kinni hoida. Ja mis kõige hullem, see meeldib talle!

programme.title: Nad tulid kokku (2014)
programme.desc: Mollyle kuulub armas vaike magusapood. Joel tootab hiiglaslikus kondiitritoodete firmas, mis ahvardab naise tegevuse lõpetada. Noored armuvad, lahevad lahku ja saavad uuesti kokku.

programme.title: Kutt, abiellu minuga
programme.desc: Andekas Maroko tudeng, kes tuleb Pariisi õppima, ei ilmu eksamile. Nuud peab ta riigist lahkuma või leidma viisi seaduslikult jaada. Abi oleks fiktiivsest abielust, ent kes sellega nõustuks? 2017

programme.title: Bridget Jonesi beebi
programme.desc: Bridget Jones peab oma sunnipaeva jalle uksi ja on sellest surmani tudinenud. Et midagi muuta, laheb ta sõbrannadega muusikafestivalile. Seekordsed sekeldused ei puuduta mitte ainult teda ennast.

programme.title: 1+1 on pere
programme.desc: Seelikukutt Sami muretu elu muutub hetkega põrguks. Tema hoolde usaldatakse imik, kes on vaidetavalt tema tutar. Otsides maimukese ema satub ta võõrasse riiki ilma raha ja toota, ent oma lapsega... 2016

programme.title: Viha parem pool
programme.desc: Kui Terry Wolfmeyeri abikaasa kaob ootamatult, uritavad tutred lahendada ema armuprobleemid ning perekonnas taas tasakaalu jalule seada.

programme.title: Perekondlik roov
programme.desc: Kahel neiul ei ole aimugi teineteise olemasolust, kuni nad saavad teate nende uhise isa surmast. Tutred tulevad isa koju parandust vastu võtma, kuid leiavad isa eest taie elu ja tervise juures. 2016

programme.title: Koerte hotell
programme.desc: Mahajaetud hotell, kuhu on kolinud hulkuvad koerad, jaab silma kahele lapsele. Neil ei lubata koeri koju tuua ja nad otsustavad teha koerale oma kodu, kus saaksid elada kõik kodutud koerad.

programme.title: Poiste ja plikade vark
programme.desc: Vaikne oivik ja kooli jalkameeskonna kapten ei salli teineteist silma otsaski. Juhtub aga nii, et nende kehad lahevad võlujõul vahetusse ning neil tekib võimalus teineteist lahemalt tundma õppida.

programme.title: Terminal
programme.desc: Ida-Euroopa turist leiab end ootamatult JFK lennujaamast lõksust. Tal tuleb sinna ajutiselt elama asuda.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona

programme.title: Johnny English asub vastuloogile
programme.desc: Ulatuslik kuberrunnak salajastele arhiividele paljastab kõik Briti luure salaagendid. Hakkeri tabamiseks kutsutakse errulainud agent Johnny English tagasi teenistusse.

programme.title: Rokkiv kool
programme.desc: Dewey Finn luuakse rockbandist valja. Temast saab asendusõpetaja ranges eraalgkoolis, kus ta puub enda õpetatavas klassis rockbandi luua.

programme.title: Bridget Jonesi paevik
programme.desc: Parast jarjekordset vanematekodus veedetud jõulupidu otsustab Bridget uut elu alustada. Aitab kahjulikest harjumustest ja kilode kogumisest! Ta haarab ohjad enda katte ja hakkab paevikut pidama. 2001

programme.title: Bridget Jones: taitsa lõpp
programme.desc: Bridge ja Mark on juba ule kuu koos olnud ning naine hakkab jalle kahtlema, kas ta on piisavalt kena või jaab peagi jalle uksi. Too teisel pool maakera peab andma aega elu ule jarele mõelda. 2004

programme.title: Juhusuhe

programme.title: Sajab kive (1993)

programme.title: Nutikas kurikael

programme.title: Firma
programme.desc: Noor jurist asub toole prestiižikasse advokaadiburoosse, millel on sunge tumedam pool.

programme.title: Neli venda
programme.desc: Nelja noormehe kasuema lastakse poeroovi kaigus maha ning nood asuvad ise juhtumit lahendama ja mõrtsukaid otsima. Kuid kõik ei olegi nii, nagu esialgu paistab.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: Amanda and Mandy try every trick in the book to help a snared hyena, and the teams plan to release a troop of 13 monkeys is thwarted by last-minute surgery and some crafty escape artists.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: Outback Vet
programme.sub-title: Katy treats a Staffie with a deadly disease, a Great Dane rescues a dog needing a blood transfusion, and Rick and zoologist Ed Swinhoe test a wild dingos DNA in the outback near Exmouth.
programme.desc: Meet Rick Fenny, a 40-year career veterinarian; he regularly embarks on a round trip across Western Australia to visit remote clients, working with animals in some of the most hostile conditions.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.sub-title: Natures smartest prey species employ unique skills to avoid detection, outsmart their enemies, or when all else fails - retaliate - they have found a way to fight another day.
programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of natures wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian meets poorly boy Georgie, a little Lhasa apso with a huge and horrible-looking mouth tumour; Peter examines a cow that has prolapsed her uterus and has to work quickly to try to save her.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.sub-title: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt arrives in eastern Zambia to film three packs of wild dogs - the Manzis, Kakulis and Stork Colony - in three very different territories.

programme.title: Natures Ultimate Survivors
programme.sub-title: We explore the world of animal intelligence and skill; from problem-solving primates to brainy birds and masterful hunters, we reveal the surprising way these creatures use their brainpower.
programme.desc: We explore a diverse range of topics that showcase the incredible survival skills animals have developed over time and feature our top 20 animal species for each of these categories.

programme.title: Deadly Hunters
programme.sub-title: Planet Earth is home to fearsome creatures equipped to maintain their position as apex predators - they are armed to the teeth and possess a predatory prowess few can escape.
programme.desc: We take a look at some of the animals that have led the way in refining their skills as masterful huntsmen; using their size, strength and unique weapons, animals use it all in order to survive.

programme.title: Deadly Hunters
programme.sub-title: Careful where you step - hidden beneath logs, in trees, empty burrows and long grass are creatures so deadly that one bite is enough to take down a full-grown elephant.
programme.desc: We take a look at some of the animals that have led the way in refining their skills as masterful huntsmen; using their size, strength and unique weapons, animals use it all in order to survive.

programme.sub-title: Dr Bree is worried about the gas in Sandy the Eastern grey kangaroo joeys tummy, Smaug the bearded dragon has a bone lodged in his throat, and Willow the owlet nightjar has fallen out of his nest.
programme.desc: At the Byron Bay Wildlife Hospital, Dr Bree and her team are dedicated to saving Australian wildlife; they treat every animal - from tiny echidnas to koalas and kangaroos - from their vet truck.

programme.title: Wonders of Mexico
programme.sub-title: The temples of the Maya tower over the forests of the Yucatan; the watery underworld is still being explored and holds the key to how animals and people survive the dry season.
programme.desc: This documentary series reveals Mexicos astonishing wildlife, landscape and culture as we pay a visit to the ancient temples of the Maya, the Sierra Madre, and the Sonoran and Chihuahuan deserts.

programme.title: A Year on Planet Earth
programme.sub-title: Winter has begun as the Northern Hemisphere freezes; life is at its hardest with less solar energy, and the Arctic sun has set and wont return until the spring.
programme.desc: We journey around the Sun in this series and witness the incredible strategies that animals use to cope with every season in their constantly changing worlds.

programme.title: A Year on Planet Earth
programme.sub-title: Transformation is enormous as the Northern Hemisphere starts to face the suns rays in March; spring is a season of opportunity as the great melt begins and new life erupts.
programme.desc: We journey around the Sun in this series and witness the incredible strategies that animals use to cope with every season in their constantly changing worlds.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Beautiful Landscapes
programme.sub-title: We explore the extraordinary landscape of Snowdonia, from the wildlife of the Llyn Peninsula to slate mines, rainforest, and the magnificent peaks of Tryfan and Mount Snowdon itself.
programme.desc: Travel through the worlds most beautiful landscapes; from wide views to the tiniest close-up, witness spectacular footage and discover the glories of rivers, jungles, and mountains from every angle.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.sub-title: A leg infection hampers a young duikers release, Dr Amanda tracks and collars a young lion, and we check on an ailing bush baby and greet a new addition to the centre, a grumpy grey parrot.
programme.desc: The team at the Lilongwe Wildlife Trust in Malawi in Africa are dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating injured and orphaned animals, ensuring they get back into the wild where they belong.

programme.title: The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.sub-title: Dr James treats a Boyds Forest dragon at the clinic, Dr Shane treats a carpet python called Red, and Dr Catherine sees an emergency case; sun conure parakeet Tequila is in a lot of pain.
programme.desc: Dr James Haberfield and his team from Unusual Pet Vets treat the most bizarre and beloved animals in Australia; with three clinics across the country, they see hundreds of species every week.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.sub-title: Some species have baffled scientists. We discover the biological marvel that is the saiga antelope, the odd diets of the gelada baboons and greater bamboo lemurs and much more.
programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of natures wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: An emotional emergency for Peter at a friends farm; Steves wife is seriously ill, and now her favourite sheeps life is in the balance. Julian tries to remove an abscess on Karine the alpacas chin.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter faces a difficult calving at Ed McDonalds farm; can he get a baby out alive and save mum? Also, Julian faces one of his biggest ever challenges trying to treat one-ton Clydesdale horse Howard.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Its Julzs last week; an encounter with lions scatters the Stork pack, Julz spots the Kakuli puppies feeding on a puku carcass, and the Manzi pack fight a warthog by the Luangwa River.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.
